snippet: An attorney general filed a civil rights suit against the protester, contending that his yelling outside a Portland Planned Parenthood clinic disrupted the staff.
abstract: Maine Attorney General Janet Mills files civil rights lawsuit against Brian Ingalls, alleging his loud yelling while protesting outside Portland Planned Parenthood clinic violated Maine’s Civil Rights Act.
lead_paragraph: An attorney general filed a civil rights suit against the protester, contending that his yelling outside a Portland Planned Parenthood clinic disrupted the staff.

headline.main: Maine: Anti-Abortion Protester Faces Lawsuit Over Loud Protests
headline.print_headline: Maine: Anti-Abortion Protester Faces Lawsuit Over Loud Protests
